contents.text: Thank you for calling OpenDNS, based in San Francisco, where we deliver security beyond the firewall.
For information on our DNS-based security solutions, press '1'.
To speak with Sales about product demos and pricing, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our Sales team for demos and pricing.

navigationGoals: Arrange a product demo and discuss pricing for the DNS security solution
I’d like a demo of your DNS security solution, pricing details, and to ask if you offer any veteran discounts.
Schedule a product demo and get pricing for your DNS-layer security solution.
I need someone to walk me through the cost and a demo of your DNS security service.
I’d like to schedule a demo and get pricing details for your DNS security solution for academic use.

contents.text: For details on enterprise deployment and integration services, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to our Deployment Services specialists.

navigationGoals: Clarify enterprise deployment options and integration timeline for OpenDNS
I need to discuss deployment and integration options for your DNS security at our veteran support center.
Discuss enterprise deployment architecture and API integration services for OpenDNS.
I’d like help planning and integrating your DNS security solution into my network.
I need information on how to integrate OpenDNS into our university’s network infrastructure.

contents.text: For support with an existing service or technical assistance, press '2'.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to Technical Support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot an ongoing DNS resolution issue with technical support
I’m having trouble with my OpenDNS policies not applying across our office network and need technical help.
Troubleshoot resolution failures on my existing OpenDNS service.
I’m having trouble with my existing DNS service and need technical support.
I’m experiencing DNS filtering issues in my lab and need technical troubleshooting.

contents.text: For billing and account inquiries, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to the Billing department.

navigationGoals: Review recent invoice charges and update billing information
I want to review my latest invoice and update the payment method on my account.
Review my OpenDNS account billing statement and update the payment method.
I need assistance understanding my account charges and billing details.
I have questions about my account charges and eligibility for an academic discount.
